overview: Johan Volny's directorial debut, featuring a stupendous selection of the Prague maestro's finest moments - both alone and in the company of his horny Czech-mates! A definite must-see for those who adore this east-European sex-god, who even surrenders his butt to Jimmy Call for your delectation; as well as those who simply enjoy fresh, sweet, bubble-butted flesh in all its youthful glory.
title: Exposed
